snippet: Fight to the last point is the mantra drilled into aspiring champions but Italian Fabio Fognini took a different approach in his five-set defeat by Kevin Anderson at Wimbledon on Friday....

headline.print_headline: Bad-Boy Fognini Crashes Out With Volley at Wimbledon
headline.main: Bad-Boy Fognini Crashes Out With Volley at Wimbledon

lead_paragraph: Fight to the last point is the mantra drilled into aspiring champions but Italian Fabio Fognini took a different approach in his five-set defeat by Kevin Anderson at Wimbledon on Friday.
